body.data:
**Yes.**

Berlin is the capital of Germany, serving as the seat of the federal president, chancellor, and parliament (Bundestag).[1][2][4] This status was reinstated in 1990 after reunification, with the government fully relocating by 1999, as confirmed by the German constitution amended in 2006.[1][2][3] Reliable sources, including official German government sites and encyclopedias, unanimously affirm this.[1][2][3][4][5][6]
